sen.j: 松崎 静馬（まつざき しずま、生没年不詳）は壬生浪士組、及び新選組の隊士である。
sen.e: Shizuma MATSUZAKI (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of the Mibu Roshi-gumi (masterless samurai group of Mibu) and the Shinsengumi (a Tokugawa shogunate police force located in Kyoto).

sen.e: He joined the corps in or after July 1863, and he participated in the Coup of August 18.

sen.e: As his name is in the 'persons died from accidents or disease' section on the stone monument which was erected in Itabashi by Shinpachi NAGAKURA, it is believed that he died for some reason while he was in the corps.
